description_list.description: This dataset includes 3-D distribtion functions in velocity space of low-energy electrons measured by the LEPe instrument onboard the ERG (Arase) satellite. The data are archived in the netCDF format. The data files can be accessed with web browsers or data analysis software such as SPEDAS. Use level-2 dataset instead of the level-1 dataset if it is available. The level-1 data are available from 2017-05-19 till 2018-09-24, as of 2020-09-15.
